You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesZ Z] > &zcaron;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Zcaron;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/017d/index.htm U+0017D].
  * `&zcaron;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/017e/index.htm U+0017E].
